name: Messenger
r1: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 100% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
r2: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 125% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
r3: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 150% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
r4: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 175% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
r5: Aimed Shot hits on weak spots deal an additional 200% ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
